name: Magic Cookie Bars
recipeIngredient: 2 Cups Ghirardelli Semi - Sweet Chocolate Chips
14 oz fluid sweetened condensed milk (NOT evaporated milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350F (325F for glass dish). In 13" x 9" baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs over butter; pour sweetened condensed milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients; press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned.
Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars. Store covered at room temperature.
